Dialogue.Page: Mod: On A Rail! Authors: Can't Afford a Name
On A Rail! is a mod made for the fifth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community, taking place on a miniature solar system on rails.
Like Heliostudy and a few other entries, On A Rail! quickly gained appreciation from the modding community for its great creativity and clever puzzles.
Perhaps this mod will find itself on the leaderboard?
